definitions.text: the sound of knocking (as on a door or in an engine or bearing)

examples: he took a bash right in his face
he got a bang on the head
he gave the table a whack

definitions.text: deliver a sharp blow or push :
examples: He knocked the glass clear across the room

definitions.text: knock against with force or violence
examples: My car bumped into the tree

definitions.text: make light, repeated taps on a surface
examples: he was tapping his fingers on the table impatiently

definitions.text: sound like a car engine that is firing too early
examples: the car pinged when I put in low-octane gasoline
The car pinked when the ignition was too far retarded

definitions.text: find fault with; express criticism of; point out real or perceived flaws
examples: The paper criticized the new movie
